pages.text: Mi inna Aisa, mmi s n Meryem: "A yAt Isoail! Nek d amazan n Oebbi $uowen, ad tebbte$ ayen iyi d izwaren n Tuoa. U a kwen beccoe$ s Umazan ara d iasen, deffir i, ism is Aemed". Mi ten id iusa s ubeggen, nnan: "wagi d sseur n uuee
Anwa idensen sennig win id igren tikerkas af Oebbi, u neppa ipwanced ar wannuz? Oebbi ur Inehhu agdud imednas
B$an ad ssexsin tafat n Oebbi, s imawen nnsen. Oebbi ad Itim tafat iS, di nneqwma ijehliyen
D Neppa id Iuznen Amazan iS, s nnhaya, d ddin n tidep, iwakken a t issifrir f ddin meooa, di nneqwma ijehliyen
A wid iumnen! Ma d awen Mle$ ssuq ara kwen isellken seg uaaqeb aqeoean
Amnet s Oebbi akked Umazan iS. Nna$et deg ubrid n Oebbi s wayla nnwen, u s yiman nnwen; ppif akka i kunwi, lemmer tessinem
Ad awen Isemmee ibekkaven nnwen; a kwen Issekcem ar leonanat degsen isaffen ppazzalen, tinezdu$in igerzen, di leonanat n Aaden; d wagi ay d rrbee ameqwoaean
Ayen teemmlem nniven: afus s$uo Oebbi akked l$elb aqoib. Ssefoee lmumnin

A wid iumnen! Illit d iwiziwen n Oebbi, akken inna Aisa, mmi s n Meryem, i inmahalen is: "anwi ay d iwiziwen iw ar Oebbi"? Nnan d inmahalen: "nekwni d iwiziwen n Oebbi". Tumen terbaat, tejhel terbaat, n At Isoail. Nefka afus i wid iumnen, mgal icenga nnsen, d$a rebeen
